item.title: Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders
item.description:
About This Game





Robin Hood - Sherwood Builders is an action-adventure RPG with base-building elements, where you take on the role of a classic hero who stands up to the tyranny and injustice that haunts Sherwood. As Robin, youâ€™ll fight, hunt, craft, steal, and of course help the local people thrive to spite the Sheriff of Nottingham and his ruthless regime â€“ all within an open-world environment that can be freely explored.



Robin Hood is a famous hero of medieval English folk tales, believed to have during that time roamed the forests of Sherwood with his band of loyal outlaw companions. In the game youâ€™re going to meet those legendary characters as well, such as Lady Marian, Little John, Friar Tuck, Allan-a-Dale, and Will Scarlet.



Robin's main goal is to help a fledgling community of refugees and rebels advance and expand. Starting with what could be described as a small forest settlement, with a bit of care, hard work, and good luck, it can end up as a town full of people. Recruit local peasants, rebels on the run from the law, and even the citizens and guards of Nottingham themselves as your new outlaw settlers.



You start your adventure with building a forest camp, which can soon be expanded following the arrival of new residents. You will be responsible for properly managing the space you secured for yourself within Sherwood Forest to build up the village.



Another important part of taking care of the settlement will be to manage the community membersâ€™ professions and tasks, training them to become craftsmen, hunters, or guards, and to manage the settlementâ€™s resources, either gathering them yourself or stealing them from convoys and noble estates.

As Robin's people grow large in number and strong in sword arm, an uprising in Nottingham may just become a reality, ending the Sheriff's tyranny once and for all.
Can Robin Hood and his Merry Men survive and put an end to injustice? Their fate is up to you!

item.title: Machine Runaway
item.description:
About This Game

MACHINE RUNAWAY is a third-person shooter game where you aim from 200 floors underground to the surface. The protagonist can transform into enemy characters. Make full use of the abilities of various enemy characters to advance the game to your advantage.

Transform Into Enemies


The protagonist can only shoot and kick, but can transform into enemy characters. Transforming allows you to use that character's attacks. Collect as many transformable characters as possible from treasure chests or by defeating bosses to gain an edge in battle.

No Healing Items


There are no healing items or skills. However, characters not in use gradually recover HP. Survive by strategically switching characters. Be cautious, as a character takes time to repair once destroyed.

Story


The protagonist, having developed 'transformation' technology, is deemed a dangerous robot with a bounty on their head. Hunted by other robots, he aims to escape to the surface from the bottommost level, 200 floors down. Fight off the attacking robots and aim for the surface.

Localization


Not fully localized. The subtitles that appear when you hover over the menu have been translated.

item.title: The Cable Guy
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of cable chaos!


You are the IT company's savior, the one and only cable guy.
Your mission is to navigate through a procedurally generated maze of tangled wires and connect all the users to their servers in the corporate network.
In an ever-changing office environment, you'll have a ton of cables and other nifty tools to help you keep your job and everyone from losing their cool.

Features:
  • Use every tool at your disposal to maintain connectivity of your company's network
  • With a procedurally generated map layout every game is a unique puzzle to solve
  • Play at your speed - with different difficulty modes you can either relax and chill or face the challenge of hectic problem-solving with constantly rising demand and complexity of the network
  • Compete with others for the top place on the leaderboard
  • Control the flow of the game with random events
  • Enjoy minimalistic colorful art style quirky animations of idle workers and a wonderful soundtrack

item.title: The Wolf's Hunt
item.description:
About This Game

This is a Third Person action game with real life visual effects. You are roll playing a wolf who has the ability to sneak up to or past enemies, attack them, or howl for back up from other wolves in the forest. Your wolf cubs have been captured by hunters. To free them, you must follow the dirt path and successfully complete all the levels of the game. As you go along the path in each level, you can either sneak past the hunters or attack them alone or with your allied wolves. Be careful as the hunters can shoot and kill you which will require you to restart that level. You will know you have successfully passed a level when your screen pauses temporarily. Each level is more challenging with more hunters and other enemies crossing your path. At the last level you will see your cubs in a cage. You must kill all the hunters that are holding your cubs in the last level before they can be released from the cage. The goal of the game is to free your cubs.

item.title: Summonsters
item.description:
About This Game

Summon creatures and combine powerful artifacts to defeat bosses!

Combining three of the same summons will upgrade them to a higher star rating.
Summons with a 3-star rating possess unique special effects.
Utilize these effects to craft your own strategic combination of summons.
Leverage the 3-star effects of all 21 summon types to adapt to various situations!

Combine artifacts following specific recipes to create Epic and Legendary grade artifacts.
Combine 2 to 3 artifacts of Common, Uncommon, or Rare grade to create a higher-grade artifact.
Combining three higher-grade artifacts will yield a Legendary artifact.
Discover more than 107 artifacts, 44 recipes, and 8 Legendary artifacts!

Defeat three bosses and eleven types of elites.
Defeat the boss appearing every 10 minutes and the elites that emerge at various locations on the map to acquire significant amounts of gold and artifacts.
The final boss appears at the 30-minute mark. Good luck!

Tips
Leveling up in the store increases the player's health and movement speed, and introduces higher-priced summons.
Additionally, the maximum number of summons you can have will increase, and you'll be able to select an artifact of your choice.
Find and eliminate elites on the map as quickly as possible to grow stronger!

item.title: StarsAway
item.description:
About This Game

Classic rail shooter action. Find secrets and tactics to clear levels effectively across three difficulty settings.

Features an original atmospheric synthesiser soundtrack with a total of 11 tracks.

Do a barrel roll.


Beating levels in different difficulties unlocks a range of mini games that involve flying and driving and more as you navigate and explore a range 3d environments. The mini games are typically about 10 minutes long and, as with the main game, they are designed to be replayed in pursuit of high scores and best times.

Included Mini Games:
  • Rings â€“ Endlessly fly through rings until you miss one
  • Ball â€“ Roll around various obstacles collecting candy
  • Rocket â€“ Use a jet pack to navigate environments and fly through rings within time limits.
  • Car 1, Car 2, Car 3 â€“ Try and achieve best times around 3 courses.
  • Flying 1, Flying 2, Flying 3 â€“ Fly around 3 different islands each with 60 trickily placed collectables.
  • Survivor â€“ A little 2d auto shooter style game with 8 different power ups to level.

item.title: Cyber Puncake
item.description:
About This Game

You will play as a pancake chef, on a never-ending snack cart, constantly making â€œchinese crepesâ€ for the customers who come by, and getting ratings and ingredients.

First sprinkle some flour, beat some eggs, add some scallions, and finally add some toppings, spread some sauce, and a piece of authentic 'Jianbing guozi' is freshly baked!

Features

  • Cyberpunk art
  • Sensational music
  • Easy to play
  • Rich ingredients
  • Realistic cooking simulation
  • Most items on the snack cart can be interacted with
  • Immersive gaming experience

Story

In 2098, although the technology of the earth has â€œprogressedâ€, human civilization has taken another path. The â€œhumanismâ€ spirit brought by the Renaissance was replaced by â€œtechnologismâ€. People believe that the development of technology will bring unlimited freedom and even create infinite possibilities. For example, the invention of electronic brains allows people to truly feel what is â€œimagination without boundariesâ€. The invention of electronic limbs and auxiliary body parts allows people to see and accept the death of God in religion and the birth of God in technology.

People have become accustomed to and enjoy letting technology dominate everything, from birth to death, from three meals a day to work and leisure, as long as they have money, they can live like gods. There has never been a kind of capitalism that makes everyone so firmly believe in the power of money. Money buys technology, and technology summons God.

Of course, the remnants of the old enlightenmentâ€™s â€œhumanismâ€ have not been extinct. They can always survive on the edge of cities and networks. In 2098, in New Dragon City of the American Federation, an organization called â€œImuneâ€ removes identity chips for people for free, to get rid of the information control of the capital government union on individuals. At the same time, the advertising department of Pineapple Dragon, the largest company in New Dragon City, is hunting down â€œImuneâ€. The player-controlled â€œchefâ€ is one of the leaders of â€œImuneâ€. According to the law designated by Pineapple Dragon and the government, such a thought criminal as â€œImuneâ€ will be subjected to â€œthought deprivationâ€ punishment, implanting brain invasion accessors for criminals, and providing some customers with special services-legal brain invasion (role-playing), to deprive thought criminals of their right to use their own brains.

Some thought criminals will act as cleaners on the outer walls of skyscrapers, some will be arranged as executioners for illegal violent organizations, and of course, there are also some low-stimulation occupations, such as some thought criminals will be assigned to snack stalls as stall owners. It should be noted that this service is different from the â€œBraindanceâ€ system used by ordinary customers. After all, BD is just a kind of â€œreplayâ€, but this service provides a kind of â€œrealest experienceâ€. Customers can see in reality the consequences caused by their own actions.

In snack cart No. 98, players will invade into the brain of a former leader of the â€œImuneâ€ organization, play as a chef, cook pancakes and get feedback from â€œcustomersâ€.

item.title: æ­»äº¡è¾¹ç¼˜ | Edge of Death
item.description:
About This Game

About this game
Edge of Death is a horror survival adventure game independently developed by a middle-aged poor rapper. The story takes place between the life and death of an ordinary policeman! In the back of his brain, to be exact! Players will encounter various monsters and ghosts in a strange space and find a way to escape. As the plot deepens, demons hiding in the dark gradually surface. This game will bring you a unique experience!

Game features


The nostalgic '80s VHS art style, the weird core atmosphere, reminiscent of the early' 80s fantasy horror movies.
The game seeks horror from the outside in. The face horror is everywhere, but the real horror lies beneath the game.
Fortunately, the light of humanity is also revealed!

You will follow in the footsteps of the main character, embark on a journey full of thriller and unknown exploration, to find the truth of the story.
It's weird and it's kind of weird, but it's probably happening somewhere and it's just not being talked about.

A game within a game, a story within a story. The player needs to feel. Different players will have different answers and experiences about death!

The difficulty design is just right, not difficult but challenging. The puzzles are tightly integrated with the story, making the story experience more interesting.

item.title: Vstar
item.description:
About This Software

Vstar: A place to record and enjoy moments with Virtual Stars

Vstar is a VR Platform where you can save precious moments with your favorite virtual stars and, whenever you want, bring those cherished moments back to meet the virtual stars as much as you like.

You can have the following experiences on Vstar.
1) Show off to others : You can dance, make fun poses, and talk sweetly in your favorite avatar."
2) See other Virtual Stars : You can watch saved moments of other virtual stars. You can see them dance, make poses, and talk sweetly. You can dance with them, copy their poses, and look into their eyes when they talk sweetly."

item.title: Killmaiden
item.description:
About This Game


Fight your way through 66 levels. Choose one of three goals in each level:
  • Defend yourself until the entire map is purified
  • Destroy all enemy portals
  • Find the key and escape

Kill all ten bosses on your way to meet the devil himself. Each boss has a more or less complex level. Find out how you can beat them.

Choose from 39 skills, organized into three main groups and three additional weapon groups to upgrade them.

Each difficulty has its own Steam leader board, see if you can break the high score and reach the top.

item.title: Coin Pusher Casino
item.description:
About This Game

Coin Pusher Casino brings the excitement of classic coin pusher machines to your computer!
With its engaging gameplay and realistic physics, Coin Pusher Casino is a must-play for fans of arcade and coin pusher games.

Coin Pusher Casino is a complete package with different game modes!
Play super casual in Zen mode, challenge yourself in Classic time attack or go all in by playing Arcade mode.

Win massive profits, collect big prizes and unlock amazing coin pusher machines!
Use your credits in the Perk Shop and upgrade the way you like to play!
Go to the Coin Shop and choose from many coins to customize your game experience!
There are many collectables and specials to collect!

Looking for a great Coin Pusher Simulator experience?
Wait no longer, start pushing those coins in Coin Pusher Casino!



Discover all the features in Coin Pusher Casino!
  • Juicy simulator quality physics
  • A growing collection of coin pusher machines and levels.
  • Arcade mode (Power-ups & Wheel of fortune)
  • Classic mode (Time challenge)
  • Zen mode (Play relaxed)
  • A Perk Shop for your upgrades
  • A Coin Shop for more playable coins
  • A growing list of collectables to collect
  • Specials like power-ups, keys and chests
  • Single player & offline support
  • Input support for: mouse only, keyboard only, keyboard + mouse, game controller.
  • Zen music playlist
  • Option wheel, dynamic panels and direct key input schemes



Coins:
  • US & Canadian Quarters
  • Yen, Hong Kong Dollar & Ancient Chinese coins
  • Euro & UK Pence coins
  • Deutsche Mark, French Franc & Dutch Kwartje
  • Bitcoin, Ethereum & Theta coins
  • Copper, Silver, Gold & Platinum coins
  • Tree Nuts Games coins in various colors



Perks:
  • Insert coin skill for faster insert coin
  • AutoPlay for lazy play or tactics
  • Skill Stop
  • Lucky charms
  • and many more!

Settings:
  • Screen settings and resolution settings
  • Quality / Power Saving settings
  • Music and sound effects volume settings
  • Selective or complete game reset options to replay and challenge yourself

item.title: the jester's revenge
item.description:
About This Game

Discover a kingdom where humor meets the ghostly and laughter intertwines with vengeful spirits. Prepare yourself for an unforgettable adventure with a jester, whose life was brutally ended by the king. Now, as a spirit thirsty for revenge, he returns to torment his oppressor. Are you ready to dive into this humorous, supernatural world?

Our tale begins at the moment when the king, in a fit of anger and outrage, condemns his jester to death. Instead of finding peace, the jester's ghost returns, filled with a desire for revenge and a longing to drive the king mad. As a ghost, the jester possesses new, supernatural abilities to haunt and vex the king in the most inventive and humorous ways.

As the ghost of the jester, you must use your spectral powers to create illusions, scare, and manipulate the surroundings. Your actions need to be subtle yet impactful to effectively affect the life of the king and his courtiers. Remember, as a spirit, you have unique capabilities but also limitations, making each prank a challenge.

The kingdom, still vibrant and bustling, takes on a new, mysterious dimension in the night-time scenarios. In the darkness of the royal halls and hidden corridors, every shadow can be your ally. The game's world combines humorous elements with a gothic atmosphere, creating a unique blend of comedy and horror.

Are you ready to become vengeance from beyond the grave? Join our extraordinary adventure, where the ghost of a jester leads a humorous rebellion against the king. Your ingenuity and ghostly powers are the only keys to success. Step into this gloomy yet funny world and become the master of spectral pranks!

item.title: Doors and Doors
item.description:
About This Game

Your mission is to survive!

Features:

  • horror atmospheric theme
  • real first-person player class with the dynamic camera system
  • real locomotion system for a first-person horror game
  • player fatigue system if he runs too much
  • dynamic item drag and drop system
  • flashlight system( switchable to zoom on close or far away points / have particle efects)
  • doors and key system (contains Normal and sliding doors)
  • ladder system with the ability to go up and down with sounds
  • cabinet system with the ability to hide items in it
  • note system with images and texts
  • jump scare system based on items and sounds
  • AI monster with the ability to navigating the map(walking, running), search for the player, capture the player, lose the player, open and close doors
  • some puzzles
  • keypad and safebox system
  • interact with the radio (turn off / on)
  • hiding behind items with crouching
  • generator system
  • basic inventory system
  • horror sound system
  • horror effects
  • main menu with setting

Meet Froggy Mroggy

You have to get on well with Froggy Mroggy, who will run after you throughout the game. If you don't get along well, froggy mroggy can upset you.

An ADV of eternity and changeless, gifting answers from a world that force to move

Follow the story, slowly, and quietly.

â—†â—‡â—† Story â—†â—‡â—†

â€œCruel Springâ€ has come.
All human beings have had to keep moving forever.

If you stop, you become a 'Sacrifice' that will never move.
No one can overcome one's fatigue. Then no one would be able to keep being human.
But the boy and the girl continue to walk through such a world together.

Each of them has a body that can move eternally, and a journey goes on forever.
It feels like a happy changeless, but the world asks about its eternity.

Let's go on forever, and to anywhere.
Until two answers are gifted to the world...

item.title: pieces I: a maskros nebula game
item.description:
About This Game

Mysterious planets are located in the Maskros Nebulaâ€”a galaxy far away from Earth.

In Pieces I: A Maskros Nebula Game, you solve three jigsaw puzzles that will give you a glimpse of three distant planets.

- First, we take a look at the exteriors of the pizzeria "PizzaPastaMaro" in the cyber city Emoh, which is located on the planet CobeeDot. PPM was founded by Maro, a sentient android, and is frequented by many pizza fans in the city.

- Next up is Nou-Raexâ€”a planet not too far from CobeeDot that is rich in plants. Teenager Norx loves the quietude of the morning and enjoys his walks in the swamp.

- The third planet we visit is called Eskolea (or "Downpourlea" to its inhabitants). This rather dystopian planet is characterized by rainy, stormy, cloudy days and nights. Somewhat eerie that it's a rainless night all of a sudden...

Each puzzle consists of 144 pieces and takes about 30-60 minutes to complete. Featuring comic-style drawings, illustrative descriptions and a beautiful, soothing soundtrack, Pieces I introduces you to the universe of the Maskros Nebula and some iconic characters you will meet in later (narrative) owly crow games.

item.title: Midnight Cruise
item.description:
About This Game

March 18, 1920.
I've finally checked into my cabin. It's cozy and nice enough. It's a little bumpy, but I think it's something I can get used to. Before boarding, I called my mom in Stowe to tell her that I'm out of touch for the next week - we're going out to sea. My mom wished me a good rest, although her voice gave away a slight anxiety. That's okay, I'm sure this trip will be good for me, and Mom will be patient. It is time to go to bed, I am tired.
March 19, 1920.
I slept just fine! I haven't had such a good night's sleep in ages! In the morning I went to Sherry's house to visit. She's in the room next door. Our cabins are exactly the same. Sherry made me happy. She gave me a lovely music box. Except I think I lost the key somewhere in her stateroom. We'll look for it after breakfast. Oh, I think it's time for breakfast in the banquet room. I'm starving, I must hurry!

As you progress, you'll need to find keys and open locked doors. Solve puzzles and find passages. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the ship and its cabins, collect batteries for your flashlight. Ability to use the camera Solve puzzles. The darkness can conceal various secrets.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;

item.title: Nonograms
item.description:
About This Game



Nonograms is a relaxing puzzle game where you use logic and creativity. Your goal is to reveal hidden pictures by filling in specific grid cells, based on numerical clues provided for each row and column. The games in this genre are also known as Picross, Griddlers, Pic-a-Pix, Hanjie, etc.

20 free + 180 DLC puzzles (much more is planned!)
Gargantuan puzzle grids up to 35x35
All puzzles are 100% logically solvable. NO guessing is required!
Leaderboards. Compete with other players from all over the world!
Autofill of blank cells
Smooth cells animation
Colored/Monochrome cells representation
Save&Exit function to pause/continue any puzzle anytime
Stylish steampunk FullHD graphics and sound effects
Handy game controls
Multilingual support
Changeable music themes (Steampunk/Spooky/Winter/Egyptian)
In-game switching of background images and music tracks
Easy-to-understand tutorial
Relaxed game mode - no mistakes
Useful tips for beginners
Shiny achievements for experienced players

item.title: The Paradixion: Laboratory
item.description:
About This Game

In a remote, secluded location where no human foot has set foot, there is a laboratory conducting secret research.
What purpose and what kind of research is being conducted in this laboratory is unknown, but
it is clear that strange things are happening.
Help with the research being conducted in this laboratory and complete the research,
unraveling the mysterious events happening within.

[The Paradixion: Laboratory] is the second installment in the [The Paradixion] series,
created by a solo South Korean developer. It's a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.

Experience a unique story and various puzzles in a world with a distinctive ambience.

Anyone can play the game with ease thanks to its simple controls, without the need for special controls.

item.title: Lady of bones, a mother's legacy
item.description:
About This Game

Lady of Bones is a visual novel that explores the darkest corners of existence, in a world where the living and the dead are forced to coexist. It rains, always. It's called The Haze. It's the physical manifestation of a metaphysical fracture, and the city is haunted by presences, ghosts, horrors and nightmares.
After her mother's death, Maya's life became a bleak sequence of empty, gray days. Maya has no friends after dropping out of college, she is doing small jobs, and on the anniversary of the accident memories are just too many, she must get out of the city. What she doesn't know is that fate is upon her. A terrible secret, a horrible gift is her mother's legacy.
Who is the Lady of Bones, la Dama Nera? A shocking burden that will change her life and determine the entire world's future.
Every choice has its consequences, will you save Maya from her sad destiny?

- Eight different endings
- Two secret achievements
- Original soundtrack

item.title: Godrop:Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Prologue and the official version of the difference between
Levels: one in the prologue, four in the official version
Follow-up Program:
The game will continue to update content after release, which includes:
More bosses: different fighting styles and types of boss fights.
More tech: weird and wacky tech combinations.
More weapons: more basic weapons and weapon variants.
More game modes: In addition to the basic level mode there will also be a survivor mode and parkour mode.

A special rougelite game that focuses entirely on ramming, piercing, and spraying as the core gameplay. You will play as Gotrop, a powerful unknown alien invasion weapon, facing the layers of barriers set up by the arrogant and ignorant humans in the solar system, using good movement and killing to steal the energy of human warships, driving our strong interaction force outer armor for invincible transformation, and destroying all the enemies in our way with incredible maneuverability and invulnerable ramming ability!



A combat system focused on energy. Just by being in motion you can generate a constant stream of energy, and mysterious alien technology also allows Gotrop to steal energy directly from his enemies. There is energy can be transformed into an invincible droplet state, invulnerable and unbreakable, our enemies can not cause any damage to us, but we can directly puncture the inside of their battleships havoc!



A large number of tech components have been beamed into the solar system, and Gotrop can access tech for morphing upgrades simply by cleaning up the battlefield! Whether it's a drill that can drill into enemy ships faster, outer armor that can reflect all attacks, or a spout that spews bullets, they can be acquired after sweeping through the enemy!



The solar system has been fortified by humans and is in crisis. Gotrop will break through layers of asteroids, energy stands and turret arrays until he completely destroys the human space fleet and takes over Earth!

item.title: Raige
item.description:
About This Game

"He belongs to time."


Experience Raige's journey through a desolate world he doesn't want to live in. Why should he? It's always easier to STOP.

The Experience:

  • Observe a PSX-inspired world in first-person



  • Meet and interact with a cast of faceless characters



  • Explore various indoor and outdoor environments in a dark and depressing atmosphere



  • Six Chapters

  • Multiple Endings

  • Listen to a relentless ambient soundscape

  • Attempt to make sense of your world

  • Hope

  • Or don't.


This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.
There are very mature themes present, please proceed with caution.


welcome to step zero - sine

item.title: RUINED
item.description:
About This Game

RUINED is an exploration-centric RPG with rogue-like elements!

Each day, you wake up to a world swarmed with monsters. As you explore and defeat enemies, the day will pass and night will come. But, it will never go. The morning only comes when you go back to sleep, or die. As the night progresses, more and more monsters will appear growing stronger and stronger. However, you are not alone in this world. Some enemies will drop seeds that allow you to grow your own monsters, identical in every way except fighting with you, rather than against! Forge your army, explore the mysterious mountains, and find why the world is RUINED!

Features

  • Explore a vast range of biomes as you journey across and under the mountains!

  • Create an army of monsters to fight alongside you and vanquish the enemies in your path!

  • Sprint home before darkness falls or face the unyielding wrath of the endless night!

  • Find lost companions scattered throughout the world to rebuild society and help you in your quest!

  • Secrets and mysteries behind every corner in this lovingly hand-crafted world!

item.title: Flappy Box
item.description:
About This Game

This exhibition, brought to you by Atelier 58I0 in collaboration with designer Saul Kim, presents "Architecture Anomaly" in the playable virtual environment of Flappy Box. Navigate the world and space of Flappy Box, immersing yourself in an experience of a surreal world of architectural design and theory.

As the 17th installment in this series, the Flappy Box gallery invites you to navigate multiple levels, each dedicated to a distinct architectural concept. There is no specific objective; instead, the exhibition encourages you to enjoy, investigate, and understand these concepts at your own pace, fostering a sense of curiosity and leisure as you wander through Flappy Box. From spotting a life-size anomaly in the foggy distance to riding an elevator to the rooftop, this playable, digital exhibition challenges typical architectural design consumption. Within this virtual world and its galleries, you will gain unprecedented up-close, first-person POV access to 3-D digital models, drawings, and writings of the Architecture Anomaly series.

This unique structure seamlessly blends conceptual elements with practical functionality. The exhibition focuses on three core concepts: Singularity, Anti-Conformity, and Momentum. These architectural ideas draw inspiration from speculative realism while reflecting the designer's evolving interests over time. The building itself stands as a tangible embodiment of all three concepts, inviting visitors to explore the intersection of creativity, curiosity, and design philosophy.


Atelier 58l0, established in 2022, is dedicated to challenging oneâ€™s relationship with art and architecture through exhibitions, filmmaking, architecture design, and virtual reality. The group consists of young designers with diverse architectural interests but shared goals.

item.title: Mysteryville 2
item.description:
About This Game

Return to the intrigue of 'Mysteryville' in this amazing sequel !
Variations on the Hidden Object theme that will be encountered in 'Mysteryville 2' include searching a dimmed room with a flashlight, finding objects based on their silhouettes, collecting pairs of items and comparing two versions of the room side-by-side to note the differences between them.
And of course you'll face the puzzles and different mini-games while going through main locations.


Journalist Laura Winner just can't get enough of the odd little town of Mysteryville. After investigating the riddle of the missing cats in the first Mysteryville adventure, she returns for a visit and in spite of only wanting a relaxing vacation, finds herself sucked into another mystery.
Laura comes to Mysteryville on the invitation of old acquaintance Bill Witowsky. However, she arrives in the town to find Bill missing and an art and jewelry auction about to take place organized by the town's new priest. Could Bill's disappearance and this auction, which is totally out of character for a small town like Mysteryville, be somehow tied together? It's up to Laura to find out, with your help of course.
Over the course of the game you'll get to interact with several of the town's inhabitants, including some new faces and some who will be familiar from the first game but have assumed new responsibilities in the town. Interacting with these characters - a few standouts being the creepy scientist and the slovenly small-town sheriff - are a big part of what helps to set Mysteryville 2 not just Hidden Object game but also a full-fledged quest.

Search for and find all the clues to help you solve the case!
Pieces of paper become important evidence, and a mysterious anagram will help direct your investigation. The most important thing is not to waste any time, Mysteryville wonâ€™t be safe until you solve the case of Billâ€™s disappearance.
You're not just to searching rooms for random junk here, it feels like every hidden object search has a point to it and can be explained logically in the context of the story.
The characters and story that flesh out the experience make Mysteryville 2 a fun ride while it lasts.


The game features:

- An intriguing and interesting plot
- Colorful graphics
- Interesting and varied mini-games
- The atmosphere of a great detective story
- Breathtaking gameplay
- 22 stages, 61 level and 12 characters

item.title: The Corridors
item.description:
About This Game

Mastermind the maze. Outwit the monster. The Corridors is a puzzle platformer where your wits and reflexes are your only weapons. Leap across shifting platforms, decipher logic puzzles in claustrophobic corridors, and stay one step ahead of a relentless entityâ€¦ or face oblivion in the cold concrete depths.
